content: With a shovel in hand, time seems to quietly slip away into the earth... {A笑眯眯}And soon, fluffy new seedlings will sprout from the soil.

content: Oh, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, you're holding a shovel. Are you going to transplant some plants, meh? I can do transplants too — that's plushie replication!
